short_summary: Mobile Workstations for the Privy Council Office
description: The Privy Council Office has a requirement for 50 firm deliverables and 50 client options of Mobile Workstations, as per the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.
tags: Automatic Data Processing Equipment, System Configuration
full_summary:
# Primary Information
## Title
### Title - English
SSC 2BH2130888/A - Mobile Workstations for the Privy Council Office

### Title - French
2BH2130888/A - Postes de travail mobiles pour le bureau du conseil privé

## Summary
The Privy Council Office requires 50 firm deliverables and 50 client options of Mobile Workstations as per the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.

## Procurement Details
### Tender Reference Number
SSC-23-00021378:T

### Solicitation Number
BPM017831/21378

### Tender Closing Date
January 19th, 2023, at 14:00:00 Eastern Time

### Tender Status
Expired

## Requirements
### Quantity
50 firm deliverables and 50 client options of Mobile Workstations

### Delivery Location
Ottawa, Ontario

### Delivery Date
Within 30 federal government working days from contract award, or by March 31st, 2023, whichever comes first

### Security Requirements
None

### Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA)
None

## Trade Agreements
The procurement falls within the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Contract Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contact Information
To access the solicitation and submit your bid, please follow this link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

For any related inquiries, please address your questions in writing to:

Colin McKennirey
Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor
PO Box/CP 9808 STS T CSC
Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 4N1

Telephone: 343-572-8718
Email: colin.mckennirey@ssc-spc.gc.ca

Please note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.  Therefore, make sure to check the tender details carefully and address any potential
